attributes.action: Standard Rate Income Tax to be the same for all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Helping to reduce the burden on small business , hence creating more cash flow to invest in more staff and improve existing employees wages.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/lowerincometax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
